name: Postman
title: postman.com
shortDescription: Postman is a comprehensive platform for API development, catering to over 40 million users. It integrates features for designing, testing, and managing APIs, enhancing collaboration across teams. Developers can utilize Postman to streamline workflows, increase API discoverability, and improve onboarding processes. An example use case involves teams using shared workspaces to prototype and document APIs efficiently, ensuring consistent communication and rapid development cycles.
cons: Complexity in managing large API collections
